official_title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to provide reclassification of members of the Board of Veterans Appeals and to ensure pay equity between those members and administrative law judges.

summary.text: Reclassifies the pay and benefits for members of the Board of Veterans Appeals other than the Chairman and Vice Chairman to equal those payable to a Federal administrative law judge. Prohibits the reduction of basic pay of a member of the Board below the rate payable on the day before the effective date of this Act.

titles.title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to provide reclassification of members of the Board of Veterans Appeals and to ensure pay equity between those members and administrative law judges.
